24 October 2025

My Homelab

by Alexander

Homelab

My Homelab is used, both as a lab, wher I tinker and experiment. But it is also used to self-host sevices such as Home assistant.

Setup

  • Unifi Cloud Gateway Ultra
  • Unifi Switch Ultra PoE
  • Unifi U6
  • Mini PC

Mini PC

The Mini PC is a Minisforum UN150P with

  • Intel N150
  • 16GB RAM
  • 512GB SSD
  • 4TB External drive

I run Proxmox as my OS.

tags: homelab - self-hosting
